DOC.detailed_description: Multi-center , prospective , control , non-randomized investigational feasibility study . One hundred ( 100 ) patient de novo restenotic renal artery lesion consist > = 50 % stenosis reference vessel > = 4.0 < = 8.0 mm diameter sequentially include , 50 without sirolimus coating , follow 50 sirolimus coat Palmaz GenesisTM . Patients follow 24 month post-procedure , patient clinical assessment discharge , 1,6 , 12 24 month . This study conduct twelve investigational site . It anticipate total length time require complete study 46 month .
